thread.title: 6 things you can save a ton of money on at the end of the winter
thread.title_full: 6 things you can save a ton of money on at the end of the winter - Business Insider

author: Kelsey Mulvey
title: 6 things you can save a ton of money on at the end of the winter
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
Sorel
It may feel like you'll have to wear a heavy parka and snow boots for the indefinite future, but spring is coming.
In order to make room for chinos, polos, and other spring essentials, many stores, like REI , Sorel , Patagonia , and Backcountry , are currently holding winter clearance sales.
It may seem counterintuitive to buy new winter clothes at the end of the season, but now is actually the best time to restock your closet with fleeces, jackets, and boots.
As spring and summer clothes start requiring shelf space in stores, room needs to be made. The best way for retailers to achieve that is by slashing prices, so shoppers do the shelf clearing for them.
Many of the items still around probably aren't worth your time. But we did some browsing and found the ones that are, and we made a list for you to shop.
View As: One Page Slides Winter jackets REI Whether you're in the market for a lightweight jacket you can toss in your carry-on or a heavier parka for your next ski trip, you should be able to find a coat that suits your style and fits your budget.
1. Mountain Hardwear Men's Ghost Whisperer Down Jacket, $223.93 (originally $320) [30% off]
2. The North Face Women's Transit II Down Jacket, $169.29 -$174.26 (originally $248.95) [30% - 32% off]
3. Patagonia Men's Thunder Cloud Parka, $349 (originally $499) [30% off]
4. United by Blue Men's Ultimate American Jacket, $448.46 (originally $597.95) [25% off]
5. Patagonia Women's Down Sweater Full-Zip Hooded Jacket, $167.40 -$223.20 (originally $279) [20% -40% off]
Snow boots Sorel Most people will scramble to buy a pair once the first snowfall of the season strikes, but you'll save yourself the headache (and a couple bucks) by picking up a new pair for next winter now.
1. Sorel Women's Tivoli II High Boots, $74.98 (originally $150) [50% off]
2. The North Face Men's Chilkat Leather Boots, $95.99 (originally $120) [20% off]
3. Sperry Top-Sider Men's Cold Bay Boots, $125.99 (originally $180) [30% off]
4. UGG Women's Adirondack Boots II, $150.72 (originally $224.95) [33% off]
5. Clarks Milwright Rise Boots, $99.99 (originally $170) [41% off]
Sweaters Everlane It should go without saying that everyone needs a few sweaters in their arsenal for the fall and winter. Not only can you snag the five options below at nice discounts, you can also wear them with chinos or jeans on cool spring days.
1. Everlane Women's Cashmere Cardigan, $126 - $162 (originally $180) [10% - 30% off]
2. JackThreads Men's Chunky Cardigan, $54.98 (originally $99) [44% off]
3. Club Monaco Women's Annina Cashmere Sweater, $189 (originally $269) [30% off]
4. J.Crew Men's Raglan-Sleeve Crewneck Sweater, $59.99 (originally $79.50) [24% off]
5. Theory Men's Luxe Cashmere Sweater, $171 (originally $285) [40% off]
Flannel shirts Patagonia Perfect for weekends and casual Fridays, f lannel shirts are a lot softer and thicker than regular button-down shirts, making them a favorite choice for the fall and winter.
1. J.Crew Men's Midweight Flannel Shirt, $59.99 (originally $79.50) [25% off]
2. Uniqlo Men's Buffalo Check Flannel Shirt, $9.90 (originally $29.90) [67% off]
3. JackThreads Men's Paradise Flannel Shirt, $24.98 (originally $49) [49% off]
4. Patagonia Women's Long-Sleeved Fjord Flannel Shirt, $62 (originally $89) [30% off]
Dress coats Cole Haan A dress jacket is a smart investment for anyone whose schedule is packed with work dinners and business meetings. Since they can get expensive fast, you'll definitely want to take advantage of the sales happening right now.
1. Cole Haan Men's Melton Wool Topper, $379.95 (originally $550) [31% off]
2. Uniqlo Women's Wool Cashmere Chester Coat, $49.90 (originally $149.90) [67% off]
3. JackThreads Men's Gilmore Peacoat, $54.98 (originally $129) [57% off]
4. J.Crew Women's Coat, $249.99 (originally $378) [34% off]
5. Reiss Men's Basset Jacket, $185 (originally $620) [70% off]
Touch-screen gloves REI Adding a pair of touchscreen-compatible gloves to your winter wardrobe means you'll be able to comfortably send texts and emails on the go.
1. Smartwool Men's Stagecoach Gloves, $39.73 (originally $80) [50% off]
2. Ugg Women's Carter Smart Gloves, $104.99 (originally $150) [30% off]
3. Polo Ralph Lauren Racing Touch Gloves, $87.99 (originally $110) [20% off]
4. Echo Design Women's Touch Basic Gloves, $30.99 (originally $39) [21% off]
5. The North Face Men's Etip Gloves, $31.46 (originally $44.95) [30% off]

This does not drive our decision as to whether or not a product is featured or recommended. We operate independently from our advertising sales team. We welcome your feedback.
